PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCR_ORDER_COMP
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCR_ORDER_COMP
|| Created By : Knoll
|| Created Date : 04-Aug-2014
|| Subject Area : ORDER
|| Description : This is for loading Completed Order details from the staging table
|| VNT_OCR_ORDER_COMP
|| Change log:
||
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 10-Nov-2014 Standardization Changes
******************************************************************************************************************/
PROCEDURE LOAD(
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_this_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_max_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_batchsize NUMBER DEFAULT 1000 );
END pkg_vnt_load_ocr_order_comp;

body.name: PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCR_ORDER_COMP
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCR_ORDER_COMP
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCR_ORDER_COMP
|| Created By : Knoll
|| Created Date : 04-Aug-2014
|| Subject Area : ORDER
|| Description : This is for loading Completed Order details from the staging table
|| VNT_OCR_ORDER_COMP
|| Change log:
||
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| ------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 10-Nov-2014 Standardization Changes
||
|| Senthil 07-Jan-2015 Static data change for bus_interact_type_cd column in t_bus_interaction table
|| and request_type_cd column in t_request table
******************************************************************************************************************/
SUBTYPE t_unit_name IS VARCHAR2 (30);

-- CONSTANTS
c_stg_processed CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'P';
c_stg_in_progress CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'I';
c_stg_error CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'E';
c_pkg_name CONSTANT t_unit_name := 'PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCR_ORDER_COMP';
c_null_date CONSTANT DATE := TO_DATE ('00010101', 'YYYYMMDD');
c_special_request_cd CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'M';
c_ts_format CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (21) := 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24.MI.SS';
c_bad_parameter EXCEPTION;
-- EXCEPTION CONSTANTS
c_bulk_errors EXCEPTION;
PRAGMA EXCEPTION_INIT (c_bulk_errors, -24381);
-- THREADING BIND VARIABLES
g_this_thread NUMBER := 1;
g_max_thread NUMBER := 1;
g_batchsize NUMBER := 1000;

-- CURSORS
-- Staged ocr_order_comp for loading
CURSOR cur_stg_ocr_order_comp
IS
SELECT
-- staging control data
ocr.ROWID AS ID,
ocr.record_load_cd,

-- surrogate keys
s_bus_interact_id.NEXTVAL AS bus_interact_id,
xref.address_id AS service_address_id,
cust_xref.party_id AS customer_id,

-- columns
CASE
WHEN sys_ocr = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END AS data_source_type_cd,
ocr.cust_acct_no_ocr,
ocr.hse_key_ocr,
ocr.order_no_ocr AS order_num,
ocr.ord_class_ocr,
DECODE (ocr.ord_class_ocr, c_special_request_cd, 'SPLREQ', 'PRDORD' ) request_type_cd,
'REQ' bus_interact_type_cd,
TRIM (ocr.ord_rsn_ocr) AS reason_cd,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.ord_rsn_ocr, 1, 2)) AS reason_cd1,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.ord_rsn_ocr, 3, 2)) AS reason_cd2,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.ord_rsn_ocr, 5, 2)) AS reason_cd3,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.ord_rsn_ocr, 7, 2)) AS reason_cd4,
ocr.ord_stat_ocr AS product_order_status_cd,
TRIM (ocr.compl_cde_ocr) AS completion_cd,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.compl_cde_ocr, 1, 3)) AS completion_cd1,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.compl_cde_ocr, 4, 3)) AS completion_cd2,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.compl_cde_ocr, 7, 3)) AS completion_cd3,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.compl_cde_ocr, 10, 3)) AS completion_cd4,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.compl_cde_ocr, 13, 3)) AS completion_cd5,
TRIM (SUBSTR (ocr.compl_cde_ocr, 16, 3)) AS completion_cd6,
DECODE (ocr.create_dte_ocr, c_null_date, NULL, TO_CHAR (ocr.create_dte_ocr, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ) AS
product_order_create_date,
ocr.create_tme_ocr AS product_order_create_time,
DECODE (ocr.compl_dte_ocr, c_null_date, NULL, TO_CHAR (ocr.compl_dte_ocr, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ) AS
actual_completion_date,
ocr.compl_tme_ocr AS actual_completion_time
FROM
stg.vnt_ocr_order_comp ocr
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_service_address_vantage_xref xref
ON
xref.hs_key = ocr.hse_key_ocr
--AND xref.record_stat = 'A'
INNER JOIN t_party_vantage_xref cust_xref
ON
cust_xref.cust_acct_num = ocr.cust_acct_no_ocr
--AND cust_xref.record_stat = 'A'
WHERE
ocr.record_load_cd IS NULL
AND MOD (ASCII (SUBSTR (ocr.ROWID, LENGTH (ocr.ROWID), 1)), g_max_thread ) = (g_this_thread - 1);

TYPE t_cursor_data_tbl
IS
TABLE OF cur_stg_ocr_order_comp%ROWTYPE INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

TYPE t_ptr_tbl
IS
TABLE OF PLS_INTEGER INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

-- Forward declarations
PROCEDURE insert_bus_interact(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_bus_inter_order_xref(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_bus_interact_party_role(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl );

PROCEDURE update_staging(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_request(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_status(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_cpt_1(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_cpt_2(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_cpt_3(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_cpt_4(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_cpt_5(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_cpt_6(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_rsn_1(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_rsn_2(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_rsn_3(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_special_request_rsn_4(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_customer_order(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_status(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_cpt_1(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_cpt_2(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_cpt_3(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_cpt_4(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_cpt_5(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_cpt_6(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_rsn_1(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_rsn_2(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_rsn_3(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_rsn_4(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl );

FUNCTION filter_order(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_select_special_request IN BOOLEAN )
RETURN t_ptr_tbl;

FUNCTION filter_reason_code(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_selected_orders_i IN t_ptr_tbl,
p_select_reason_code_i IN INTEGER )
RETURN t_ptr_tbl;

FUNCTION filter_completion_code(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_selected_orders_i IN t_ptr_tbl,
p_select_completion_code_i IN INTEGER )
RETURN t_ptr_tbl;

PROCEDURE LOAD(
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_this_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_max_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_batchsize NUMBER DEFAULT 1000 )
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : LOAD
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for loading Completed Order details from the staging table '
|| VNT_OCR_ORDER_COMP'.
*****************************************************************************************************************
*/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'LOAD';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_process_rec pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
l_cursor_data t_cursor_data_tbl;
l_filter_ptr t_ptr_tbl;
-- for filtering orders in the cursor table
l_secondary_filter_ptr t_ptr_tbl;
-- for second level filtering of orders
BEGIN
l_process_rec.process_name := l_process_name;
pkg_logging.begin_process (l_process_rec, 'p_audit_user_i=' || p_audit_user_i );
g_this_thread := p_this_thread;
g_max_thread := p_max_thread;
g_batchsize := p_batchsize;

IF pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name) THEN
RETURN;
END IF;

IF (cur_stg_ocr_order_comp%ISOPEN) THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_ocr_order_comp;
END IF;

OPEN cur_stg_ocr_order_comp;

LOOP
FETCH
cur_stg_ocr_order_comp BULK COLLECT
INTO
l_cursor_data LIMIT g_batchsize;

IF (l_cursor_data.COUNT () > 0) THEN
-- Insert bus_interact
insert_bus_interact (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data);
-- Insert bus_inter_vantage_order_xref
insert_bus_inter_order_xref (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data);
-- Insert bus_interact_party_role
insert_bus_interact_party_role (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data);
-- Insert request
insert_request (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data);
-- BEGIN SPECIAL_REQUEST - select only special requests
l_filter_ptr := filter_order (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_select_special_request => TRUE );
-- Insert special_request
insert_special_request (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_filter_ptr);
-- Insert special_request_status
insert_special_request_status (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_filter_ptr );
-- If completed with completion codes, insert special_request_completion(s)
-- completion code 1
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 1 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_cpt_1 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 2
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 2 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_cpt_2 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 3
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 3 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_cpt_3 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 4
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 4 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_cpt_4 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 5
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 5 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_cpt_5 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 6
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 6 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_cpt_6 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- Insert special_request_reason(s)
-- reason code 1
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 1 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_rsn_1 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- reason code 2
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 2 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_rsn_2 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- reason code 3
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 3 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_rsn_3 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- reason code 4
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 4 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_special_request_rsn_4 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

l_filter_ptr.DELETE;
-- END SPECIAL_REQUEST
-- BEGIN PROD_ORDER - select only product orders
l_filter_ptr := filter_order (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_select_special_request => FALSE );
-- Insert customer_order
insert_customer_order (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_filter_ptr);
-- Insert prod_order
insert_prod_order (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_filter_ptr);
-- Insert prod_order_status
insert_prod_order_status (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_filter_ptr );
-- If completed with completion codes, insert prod_order_cancel(s)
-- completion code 1
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 1 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_cpt_1 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 2
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 2 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_cpt_2 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 3
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 3 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_cpt_3 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 4
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 4 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_cpt_4 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 5
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 5 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_cpt_5 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- completion code 6
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_completion_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_completion_code_i => 6 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_cpt_6 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- Insert prod_order_reason(s)
-- reason code 1
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 1 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_rsn_1 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- reason code 2
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 2 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_rsn_2 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- reason code 3
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 3 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_rsn_3 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

-- reason code 4
l_secondary_filter_ptr := filter_reason_code (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, p_selected_orders_i =>
l_filter_ptr, p_select_reason_code_i => 4 );

IF (l_secondary_filter_ptr.COUNT > 0) THEN
insert_prod_order_rsn_4 (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data, l_secondary_filter_ptr );
l_secondary_filter_ptr.DELETE;
END IF;

l_filter_ptr.DELETE;
-- END PROD_ORDER
-- Update the staging rows with status
update_staging (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data);
-- Commit the batch
COMMIT;
END IF;

EXIT
WHEN
(
l_cursor_data.COUNT () < g_batchsize
)
OR
(
pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name)
)
;
END LOOP;

CLOSE cur_stg_ocr_order_comp;

pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
ROLLBACK;

--Added as below on 10-Nov-2014 as part of Code Standardization Changes
IF (cur_stg_ocr_order_comp%ISOPEN) THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_ocr_order_comp;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_exception (l_process_rec, DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack () );
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, 'ERROR WHILE PROCESSING');
RAISE;
END LOAD;

PROCEDURE insert_bus_interact(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl )
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : INSERT_BUS_INTERACT
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for loading Completed Order details specifically into the target
|| table 't_bus_interact' via Bilk Load Mechanism.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'INSERT_BUS_INTERACT';
l_errors NUMBER;
l_coll_idx PLS_INTEGER;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', cnt=' || p_cursor_data_io.COUNT () );

BEGIN
FORALL i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_io.COUNT SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT
INTO

PROCEDURE update_staging
(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure UPDATE_STAGING
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for updating the staging table 'VNT_OCR_ORDER_COMP' for the
|| column Record_Cd_Load with value of 'P' which indicates the Finished state.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_STAGING';
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name);
FORALL i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_i.COUNT
UPDATE
stg.vnt_ocr_order_comp s
SET
s.record_load_cd = NVL (p_cursor_data_i (i).record_load_cd, c_stg_processed),
s.record_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE
ROWID = p_cursor_data_i (i).ID;
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
END update_staging;

FUNCTION filter_order(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_select_special_request IN BOOLEAN )
RETURN t_ptr_tbl
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Function FILTER_ORDER
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for finding out the position and logging filtered records into
|| an assosiative array which are formed by Bilk Load Mechanism.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'FILTER_ORDER';
l_temp t_ptr_tbl;
l_idx PLS_INTEGER := 0;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name);

FOR i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_i.COUNT
LOOP
IF ( ( p_cursor_data_i (i).ord_class_ocr = c_special_request_cd AND p_select_special_request ) OR
(
p_cursor_data_i (i).ord_class_ocr <> c_special_request_cd AND
(
NOT p_select_special_request
)
)
) THEN
l_idx := l_idx + 1;
l_temp (l_idx) := i;
END IF;
END LOOP;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
RETURN l_temp;
END filter_order;

FUNCTION filter_completion_code(
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl,
p_selected_orders_i IN t_ptr_tbl,
p_select_completion_code_i IN INTEGER )
RETURN t_ptr_tbl
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Function FILTER_COMPLETION_CODE
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for finding out the position and storing the selected completion
|| codes into an assosiative array.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'FILTER_COMPLETION_CODE';
l_temp t_ptr_tbl;
l_idx PLS_INTEGER := 0;
l_selected BOOLEAN;
BEGIN
IF (p_select_completion_code_i < 1 OR p_select_completion_code_i > 6) THEN
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', bad p_select_completion_code_i value passed!' );
RAISE c_bad_parameter;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', p_select_completion_code_i = ' ||
p_select_completion_code_i );

FOR i IN 1 .. p_selected_orders_i.COUNT
LOOP
l_selected := FALSE;

IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).product_order_status_cd = 'C' ) THEN
CASE p_select_completion_code_i
WHEN 1 THEN
IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).completion_cd1 IS NOT NULL ) THEN
l_selected := TRUE;
END IF;
WHEN 2 THEN
IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).completion_cd2 IS NOT NULL ) THEN
l_selected := TRUE;
END IF;
WHEN 3 THEN
IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).completion_cd3 IS NOT NULL ) THEN
l_selected := TRUE;
END IF;
WHEN 4 THEN
IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).completion_cd4 IS NOT NULL ) THEN
l_selected := TRUE;
END IF;
WHEN 5 THEN
IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).completion_cd5 IS NOT NULL ) THEN
l_selected := TRUE;
END IF;
WHEN 6 THEN
IF (p_cursor_data_i (p_selected_orders_i (i)).completion_cd6 IS NOT NULL ) THEN
l_selected := TRUE;
END IF;
END CASE;
END IF;

IF (l_selected) THEN
l_idx := l_idx + 1;
l_temp (l_idx) := p_selected_orders_i (i);
END IF;
END LOOP;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
RETURN l_temp;
END filter_completion_code;
